entry.title: even if his face don't stay together?

entry.title: BLOODLINE PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 155,742Chapters: 45/?Kudos: 164

Summary: At Beacon Hills Preparatory, tradition is everything. For over a century, the elite boarding school has divided its student body into five historic houses where each one seemingly determined by a mix of academic performance, behavior, and an unspoken layer of socioeconomic legacy. Most students follow in the footsteps of their families; generation after generation they're sorted into the same houses. No one questions the system. It’s simply the way things are. Until now. Midway through his freshman year, a “routine” blood test for school health records takes an unexpected turn. One sharp-witted yet grounded Stiles, recently appointed as House Prefect of the mid-tier House Flagstaff largely due to his father’s position as the town sheriff, is abruptly reassigned to House Redwood, the school’s most elite and secretive house. He must now navigate secret traditions, political manipulation, and a slow-burning forbidden romance with someone he was never meant to meet: the enigmatic sophomore son of a ruthless defense attorney.

entry.title: Ain’t Misbehavin’, Just Possessin
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,092Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: 1928. Stiles Stilinski, a medium of questionable ethics and undeniable talent, is summoned to the isolated Hale Manor—a house brooding on a cliff edge, soaked in old money and older blood. His client is the reclusive war hero Derek Hale, who needs the ghost of his uncle, Peter, gone. But Peter Hale, a narcissist in life and death, isn't lingering out of regret or rage. He’s staying for pleasure. As Stiles and his assistant Scott dig into the family's cursed history, they find the living far more dangerous than the dead. And Stiles discovers that his professional history with the stoic Derek Hale is a secret more haunting than any specter.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,692Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 141

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Carry You
entry.summary:
Author: OkyDokyPoky

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,914Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: When Scott called him that morning checking up on him and telling him so very carefully and gently that it really was okay for him to skip out on the meeting, he had told him as much. Scott had been quiet for a couple of moments, but had softly agreed after making sure that Stiles really was sure. And he was. It was just another thing to do, to distract him.  An important pack meeting on the worst day of the year.

entry.title: Stop Saying Betrothed!
entry.summary:
Author: KneazleKnowsBest

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,216Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 106

Summary: “I’m angry,” Stiles began speaking, and really, that was the problem, the speaking thing that he did. “because Derek already has a partner!”“You don’t mean…” The, theoretically normal and lovely, woman seemed skeptical, and ok wow, rude. Except the entirety of the silent-as-a-grave members of their pack were also looking at Stiles as if he was the one that was about to say something as ridiculous as the word betrothal. Again, rude.“Me? Yes. Yes I do.” The human hunkered down and dug his, metaphorical, claws in. “You can’t be…” He waved a hand between the Alpha and this new broad.“Betrothed?” She supplied quietly, and not helpfully at all, as Stiles faltered.“Stop saying betrothed!” The young spastic human shouted at the nice woman.OrIn which Stiles pretends to date Derek so that Derek doesn't have to get werewolf married to the perfect woman.

entry.title: Aquamarine
entry.summary:
Author: Hedwig221b

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,018Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 237

Summary: The nymph was the best prey Derek had ever had — evading him at every turn, yet teasing within reach. Here, in the middle of the lake, between crumbling ruins of the naiad’s temple, with Stiles pressed against him, Derek could taste the life again. He was as close to peace as it got. If only he could satisfy the heat in his lower parts, to turn his head and seal his lips against Stiles’ smile, to sink into him and make love, long and sweet, all night ‘till morning… If he could wake each day to Stiles lying next to him, maybe, then his soul would settle. But now, even while breathing the same air, Derek did not have him at all. Still, he kept coming. Fixing things, bringing things, pulling Stiles close until he stopped resisting. All creatures yearned for warmth, and Stiles, with his transparent clothes clinging to his slender, wet body was not an exception.

entry.title: Become Familiar (With the Beat of Your Heart)
entry.summary:
Author: wrappedinwolfsbane (Galileoleo)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,995Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: “His kind see humans as food,” Argent hissed at him. “The beast feasts upon the flesh of man. How can you protect him?” “He has given us shelter,” Stiles answered, steadily, “Fed us when we were hungry. He has saved the life of my sister and I when you tried to burn her as a witch. Even if what you say is true,” he took a breath, “And he does intend to butcher me like a pig, then I shall sharpen his knives and prepare the logs for his fire. I shall offer him the recipes my mother taught to me with her own hands, and I shall scour the woods for the perfect herbs for him to roast me with.”

entry.title: Inch by Inch
entry.summary:
Author: SirenAlpha

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,887Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 779

Summary: When Scott had sworn Allison had freed Erica and Boyd, Stiles had assumed that would mean they would show up at school again. When they didn't, she thought figuring out what had happened to them would only involve asking Isaac about it, a simple one step plan.A one step plan that spiraled into a massive research project trying to track Erica and Boyd down and give Derek every advantage he could get against the latest supernatural threat: a pack of alphas.

entry.title: The Wolf at Winter’s Door
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,816Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 67

Summary: Winter is closing in on the Hale valley when Derek—an exiled alpha turned recluse—finds a half-frozen omega and a baby in the snow outside his cottage. He should have left them to the storm; he’s learned what kindness costs. But the sound of the infant’s cry, and the scent of something wild and familiar in the omega’s skin, pull at the part of him that still remembers how to protect, how to care, how to love.As the snow deepens and the fire burns low, Derek’s solitude unravels thread by thread.The omega’s name is Stiles—a runaway from a war Derek has long tried to forget. He carries secrets, grief, and a child who isn’t meant to survive the winter.In a world of fading magic, hunters, and ghosts of kingdoms lost to fire, two wounded souls find warmth in each other’s silence.But the past always finds its way through the snow.

  • Graphic Depictions Of Violence
